description: Golden values for Tabs basic example regression test
note: These values are calculated from the synthetic test data in examples/tabs/basic/data.csv

checks.name: sig_flag_gender_satisfaction
checks.description: Significance flag: Male vs Female satisfaction (95% level)

checks.name: effective_n_total_weighted
checks.description: Effective N for total (with weights applied)

checks.name: top2box_recommend_total
checks.description: Top 2 box percentage for recommend (9-10 ratings)

integration_notes: Currently using mock Tabs implementation for proof-of-concept
Values are calculated from actual test data using simplified statistics
When real Tabs is integrated, recalculate these values from actual Tabs output
Test structure will remain the same - only implementation changes
